name: Sea Turtle Rescue
description:
You might like getting choked - but sea turtles don't. In Sea Turtle Rescue, you play as a mother turtle chasing after her babies lost in a cave. Don't let your babies choke on trash.

Did You Know?
Sea turtles and other marine creatures mistake plastics and other garbage as food (such as jellyfish) and ingest it. This mistake causes blockages within their digestive system and eventual death.
